mapper.select: SELECT c.*, f.* FROM campaign c LEFT OUTER JOIN campaign_file f ON c.camp_no = f.camp_no WHERE c.camp_no = #{campNo}
SELECT count(*) FROM campaign WHERE camp_state = #{state}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO certification (part_no, user_no, camp_no, part_title, part_content, part_date) VALUES (#{partNo}, #{userNo}, #{campNo}, #{partTitle}, #{partContent}, #{partDate})

INSERT INTO certification_file (part_file_no, part_no, camp_no, part_origin_name, part_stored_name) VALUES (certification_file_no_seq.nextval, #{partNo}, #{campNo}, #{partOriginName}, #{partStoredName})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM campign ORDER BY camp_no DESC

SELECT cam.camp_title, cfile.part_file_no, cfile.part_origin_name, cfile.part_stored_name, cer.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM certification WHERE user_no = #{userNo} AND part_no = #{partNo}) cer, campaign cam, certification_file cfile WHERE cam.camp_no = cer.camp_no AND cfile.part_no = cer.part_no
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CERTIFICATION WHERE camp_no = #{campNo}
